thread.title: Kirk Cousins reveals the gender of his baby with an underthrown pass
thread.title_full: Kirk Cousins reveals the gender of his baby with an underthrown pass

title: Kirk Cousins reveals the gender of his baby with an underthrown pass
text:
Mar 24, 2017 at 5:47p ET 0Shares 
A few weeks ago, Kirk Cousins and his wife, Julie, announced they were expecting a child in an original way, but they topped that Friday when they revealed the gender of the arrival that’s expected in September. 
In an Instagram post, Cousins used a no-step drop to deliver a toy football at a box painted with a gigantic question mark, and even though his throw was low and almost off target completely, the family – including the dog – seemed thrilled with the color that exploded when the ball made contact. A post shared by Kirk Cousins (@kirk.cousins) on Mar 24, 2017 at 1:48pm PDT 
Blue means boy, we’re guessing, and here’s hoping Kirk won’t still be waiting on that long-term contract he’s been wanting when his son arrives around the time the season starts. 
As for the dog, he’s been on board with having a brother from the beginning. A post shared by Julie Cousins (@juliehcousins) on Mar 4, 2017 at 12:37pm PST
